E890D6B12E5E4199BF31E945EF6AA2EF.description:
plan and produce, with consistent ease and clarity of expression, written
presentational communications that are supported with cited examples in
multiple paragraph length discourse to explain, express opinions, describe,
and narrate on topics that communicate information on a variety of
geographic, scientific, historical, artistic, social, or political features of target
culture communities.

2A3150B750BB4FD28251E1CEBFB731FB.description:
plan, produce, and present, with consistent ease and clarity of expression,
spoken presentational communications that are supported with cited
examples in multiple paragraph length discourse to explain, express opinions,
describe, and narrate on topics that communicate information on a variety of
geographic, scientific, historical, artistic, social, or political features of target
culture communities;

19ACA9FCFA634F40B18F3029B0EEE94B.description:
compare, contrast, and synthesize cultural practices and perspectives from
authentic audio and audiovisual resources.

2A4306E3751D474F83D0CE60E07517ED.description:
listen to and synthesize information from a variety of authentic audio and
audiovisual resources from the target culture that communicate information
in the past, present, and future on a variety of geographic, scientific,
historical, artistic, social, or political features of target culture communities;

67C76D129953469D9E6A146653BCB846.description:
compare, contrast, and synthesize cultural practices and perspectives from
authentic print and electronic resources;Â

EBB69ABD476E435BA6CE0D4EB73D350B.description:
read and synthesize information from a variety of authentic print and
electronic resources such as artwork, graphs, media, narratives, and
descriptions in various literary genres, including texts about past, present, and
future events that communicate information on a variety of geographic,
scientific, historical, artistic, social, or political features of target culture
communities;

AC438CA01CFC43FA9EF2BE7DE42855CD.description:
produce, with consistent use of formal and informal register, written
exchanges that provide information on a variety of geographic, scientific,
historical, artistic, social, or political features of target culture communities.

31C97C7989384B1AA42281F7A009BB20.description:
write with consistent use of formal and informal register in all time frames
and with some elaboration items such as correspondence, narratives,
descriptions, and summaries of a factual nature; and

F659E77C7B3945979C4369AD78E6978E.description:
engage in conversations with consistent use of formal and informal register in
all time frames;
